00062 /**
00063  * Creates a key object using the service discovery name profile.
00064  */
00065 static struct ccn_charbuf *
00066 ccnd_init_service_ccnb(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, const char *baseuri, int freshness)
00067 {
00068     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
00069     struct ccn *h = ccnd->internal_client;
00070     struct ccn_charbuf *name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00071     struct ccn_charbuf *pubid = ccn_charbuf_create();
00072     struct ccn_charbuf *pubkey = ccn_charbuf_create();
00073     struct ccn_charbuf *keyid = ccn_charbuf_create();
00074     struct ccn_charbuf *cob = ccn_charbuf_create();
00075     int res;
00076     
00077     res = ccn_get_public_key(h, NULL, pubid, pubkey);
00078     if (res < 0) abort();
00079     ccn_name_from_uri(name, baseuri);
00080     ccn_charbuf_append_value(keyid, CCN_MARKER_CONTROL, 1);
00081     ccn_charbuf_append_string(keyid, ".M.K");
00082     ccn_charbuf_append_value(keyid, 0, 1);
00083     ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(keyid, pubid);
00084     ccn_name_append(name, keyid->buf, keyid->length);
00085     ccn_create_version(h, name, 0, ccnd->starttime, ccnd->starttime_usec * 1000);
00086     sp.template_ccnb = ccn_charbuf_create();
00087     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_SignedInfo, CCN_DTAG);
00088     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_KeyLocator, CCN_DTAG);
00089     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_KeyName, CCN_DTAG);
00090     ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(sp.template_ccnb, name);
00091     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00092     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00093     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00094     sp.sp_flags |= CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR;
00095     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "%00");
00096     sp.sp_flags |= CCN_SP_FINAL_BLOCK;
00097     sp.type = CCN_CONTENT_KEY;
00098     sp.freshness = freshness;
00099     res = ccn_sign_content(h, cob, name, &sp, pubkey->buf, pubkey->length);
00100     if (res != 0) abort();
00101     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00102     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&pubid);
00103     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&pubkey);
00104     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&keyid);
00105     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&sp.template_ccnb);
00106     return(cob);
00107 }

00109 /* These are used in face->adjstate to track our state */
00110 #define ADJ_SOL_SENT (1U << 0)
00111 #define ADJ_SOL_RECV (1U << 1)
00112 #define ADJ_OFR_SENT (1U << 2)
00113 #define ADJ_OFR_RECV (1U << 3)
00114 #define ADJ_CRQ_SENT (1U << 4)
00115 #define ADJ_CRQ_RECV (1U << 5)
00116 #define ADJ_DAT_SENT (1U << 6)
00117 #define ADJ_DAT_RECV (1U << 7)
00118 #define ADJ_TIMEDWAIT (1U << 8)
00119 #define ADJ_PINGING  (1U << 9)
00120 #define ADJ_RETRYING (1U << 10)
00121 #define ADJ_ACTIVE   (1U << 11)
00122 
00123 /**
00124  * Update face->adjstate by setting / clearing the indicated bits.
00125  *
00126  * If a bit is in both masks, it is set.
00127  * @returns the old values, or -1 for an error.
00128  */
00129 int
00130 adjstate_change_db(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, struct face *face,
00131                 int set, int clear, int line)
00132 {
00133     int new;
00134     int old;
00135     
00136     if (face == NULL)
00137         return(-1);
00138     old = face->adjstate;
00139     new = (old & ~clear) | set;
00140     if (new != old) {
00141         face->adjstate = new;
00142         if (ccnd->debug & (2 | 4)) {
00143             /* display the bits in face->adjstate */
00144             char f[] = "sSoOcCdDTPRA\0";
00145             int i;
00146             for (i = 0; f[i] != 0; i++)
00147                 if (((new >> i) & 1) == 0)
00148                     f[i] = '.';
00149             ccnd_msg(ccnd, "ic.%d adjstate %u %s %#x", line,
00150                      face->faceid, f, face->flags);
00151         }
00152     }
00153     return(old);
00154 }
00155 #define adjstate_change(h, f, s, c) adjstate_change_db(h, f, s, c, __LINE__)
00156 /**
00157  * Append the URI representation of the adjacency prefix for face to the
00158  * charbuf cb.
00159  * @returns 0 for success, -1 for error.
00160  */
00161 static int
00162 append_adjacency_uri(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd,
00163                      struct ccn_charbuf *cb, struct face *face)
00164 {
00165     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00166     struct ccn_charbuf *comp = NULL;
00167     int res;
00168     
00169     if (face->guid == NULL)
00170         return(-1);
00171     comp = ccn_charbuf_create();
00172     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00173     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/%C1.M.FACE");
00174     ccn_charbuf_append_value(comp, CCN_MARKER_CONTROL, 1);
00175     ccn_charbuf_append_string(comp, ".M.G");
00176     ccn_charbuf_append_value(comp, 0, 1);
00177     ccnd_append_face_guid(ccnd, comp, face);
00178     ccn_name_append(name, comp->buf, comp->length);
00179     res = ccn_uri_append(cb, name->buf, name->length, 1);
00180     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&comp);
00181     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00182     return(res < 0 ? -1 : 0);
00183 }
00184 
00185 #define ADJ_REFRESH_SEC 120
00186 #define ADJ_MICROS (ADJ_REFRESH_SEC * 1000000)
00187 /**
00188  * Scheduled event to refresh adjacency
00189  */
00190 static int
00191 adjacency_do_refresh(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00192                      void *clienth,
00193                      struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
00194                      int flags)
00195 {
00196     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = clienth;
00197     struct face *face = NULL;
00198     unsigned both;
00199     
00200     face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, ev->evint);
00201     if (face == NULL)
00202         return(0);
00203     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) != 0) {
00204         adjstate_change(ccnd, face, 0, ADJ_ACTIVE);
00205         return(0);
00206     }
00207     both = ADJ_DAT_RECV | ADJ_DAT_SENT;
00208     if ((face->adjstate & both) == both) {
00209         ccnd_adjacency_offer_or_commit_req(ccnd, face);
00210         if ((face->adjstate & ADJ_PINGING) != 0)
00211             return((ADJ_MICROS + nrand48(ccnd->seed) % ADJ_MICROS) / 2);
00212     }
00213     adjstate_change(ccnd, face, 0, ADJ_ACTIVE);
00214     return(0);
00215 }
00216 
00217 /**
00218  * Register the adjacency prefix with the given forwarding flags.
00219  */
00220 static void
00221 ccnd_register_adjacency(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, struct face *face,
00222                         unsigned forwarding_flags)
00223 {
00224     struct ccn_charbuf *uri = NULL;
00225     unsigned both;
00226     int res;
00227     int adj = 0;
00228     int lifetime = 0;
00229     
00230     if ((forwarding_flags & CCN_FORW_ACTIVE) != 0) {
00231         adj = CCN_FACE_ADJ;
00232         lifetime = ADJ_REFRESH_SEC; /* seconds */
00233     }
00234     both = ADJ_DAT_RECV | ADJ_DAT_SENT;
00235     if ((face->adjstate & both) != both)
00236         return;
00237     uri = ccn_charbuf_create();
00238     res = append_adjacency_uri(ccnd, uri, face);
00239     if (res >= 0)
00240         res = ccnd_reg_uri(ccnd, ccn_charbuf_as_string(uri), face->faceid,
00241                            forwarding_flags, lifetime);
00242     if (res >= 0) {
00243         if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_ADJ) != adj) {
00244             face->flags ^= CCN_FACE_ADJ;
00245             ccnd_face_status_change(ccnd, face->faceid);
00246         }
00247         if (lifetime != 0 && (face->adjstate & ADJ_ACTIVE) == 0) {
00248             ccn_schedule_event(ccnd->sched, lifetime * 1000000,
00249                                adjacency_do_refresh, NULL, face->faceid);
00250             adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_ACTIVE, 0);
00251         }
00252     }
00253     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri);
00254 }
00255 
00256 /**
00257  * Scheduled event for getting rid of an old guid cob.
00258  */
00259 static int
00260 ccnd_flush_guid_cob(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00261                     void *clienth,
00262                     struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
00263                     int flags)
00264 {
00265     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = clienth;
00266     struct face *face = NULL;
00267     
00268     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) != 0)
00269         return(0);
00270     face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, ev->evint);
00271     if (face != NULL)
00272         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&face->guid_cob);
00273     return(0);
00274 }

00276 /**
00277  * Create the adjacency content object for our endpoint of the face.
00278  */
00279 static void
00280 ccnd_init_face_guid_cob(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, struct face *face)
00281 {
00282     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
00283     struct ccn *h = ccnd->internal_client;
00284     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00285     struct ccn_charbuf *payload = NULL;
00286     struct ccn_charbuf *comp = NULL;
00287     struct ccn_charbuf *cob = NULL;
00288     int res;
00289     int seconds = 60; /* freshness in the object */
00290     int nfresh = 20; /* flush it after this many freshness periods */
00291     
00292     if (face->guid == NULL || face->guid_cob != NULL)
00293         return;
00294     if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_OFR_SENT | ADJ_OFR_RECV)) == 0)
00295         return;
00296     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00297     payload = ccn_charbuf_create();
00298     comp = ccn_charbuf_create();
00299     cob = ccn_charbuf_create();
00300     
00301     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/%C1.M.FACE");
00302     /* %C1.G.%00<guid> */
00303     ccn_charbuf_reset(comp);
00304     ccn_charbuf_append_value(comp, CCN_MARKER_CONTROL, 1);
00305     ccn_charbuf_append_string(comp, ".M.G");
00306     ccn_charbuf_append_value(comp, 0, 1);
00307     ccnd_append_face_guid(ccnd, comp, face);
00308     ccn_name_append(name, comp->buf, comp->length);
00309     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "%C1.M.NODE");
00310     /* %C1.K.%00<ccndid> */
00311     ccn_charbuf_reset(comp);
00312     ccn_charbuf_append_value(comp, CCN_MARKER_CONTROL, 1);
00313     ccn_charbuf_append_string(comp, ".M.K");
00314     ccn_charbuf_append_value(comp, 0, 1);
00315     ccn_charbuf_append(comp, ccnd->ccnd_id, sizeof(ccnd->ccnd_id));
00316     ccn_name_append(name, comp->buf, comp->length);
00317     ccn_charbuf_reset(comp);
00318     ccn_charbuf_putf(comp, "face~%u", face->faceid);
00319     ccn_name_append(name, comp->buf, comp->length);
00320     ccn_create_version(h, name, CCN_V_NOW, 0, 0);
00321     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "%00");
00322     sp.sp_flags |= CCN_SP_FINAL_BLOCK;
00323     sp.freshness = seconds;
00324     res = ccn_sign_content(h, cob, name, &sp, payload->buf, payload->length);
00325     if (res != 0)
00326         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&cob);
00327     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00328     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&payload);
00329     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&comp);
00330     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&sp.template_ccnb);
00331     face->guid_cob = cob;
00332     if (cob != NULL)
00333         ccn_schedule_event(ccnd->sched, nfresh * seconds * 1000000 - 800000,
00334                            ccnd_flush_guid_cob, NULL, face->faceid);
00335 }

00337 /**
00338  * Isolate the lower and upper bounds for the guid component from Exclude
00339  *
00340  * This is used as part of the adjacency protocol.
00341  */
00342 static int
00343 extract_bounds(const unsigned char *ccnb, struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi,
00344                const unsigned char **plo, const unsigned char **phi)
00345 {
00346     struct ccn_buf_decoder decoder;
00347     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d = NULL;
00348     int res = -1;
00349     int x;
00350     int y;
00351     int z;
00352     size_t sz;
00353     
00354     /* We are interested only in the Exclude element. */
00355     ccnb = ccnb + pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Exclude];
00356     sz = pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Exclude] - pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Exclude];
00357     if (sz != 0) {
00358         d = ccn_buf_decoder_start(&decoder, ccnb, sz);
00359         if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Exclude)) {
00360             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00361             if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Any)) {
00362                 ccn_buf_advance(d);
00363                 ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00364             }
00365             else return(-1);
00366             x = d->decoder.token_index;
00367             ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Component, 8, 70);
00368             y = d->decoder.token_index;
00369             ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Component, 8, 70);
00370             z = d->decoder.token_index;
00371             if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Any)) {
00372                 ccn_buf_advance(d);
00373                 ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00374             }
00375             else return(-1);
00376             ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00377             if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00378                 return (-1);
00379             if (y - x != z - y)
00380                 return(-1);
00381             res = ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_Component, ccnb, x, y, plo, &sz);
00382             if (res < 0) return(-1);
00383             res = ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_Component, ccnb, y, z, phi, &sz);
00384             if (res < 0) return(-1);
00385             return(sz);
00386         }
00387     }
00388     return(-1);
00389 }
00390 
00391 /**
00392  * Handle the data that comes back in response to interest sent by
00393  * send_adjacency_solicit.
00394  *
00395  * We don't actually need to do much here, since the protocol is actually
00396  * looking for an interest from the other side.
00397  */
00398 static enum ccn_upcall_res
00399 solicit_response(struct ccn_closure *selfp,
00400                    enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
00401                    struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00402 {
00403     struct face *face = NULL;
00404     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = selfp->data;
00405     
00406     switch (kind) {
00407         case CCN_UPCALL_FINAL:
00408             free(selfp);
00409             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00410         default:
00411             face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, selfp->intdata);
00412             if (face == NULL)
00413                 return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00414             if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_SOL_SENT)) != 0)
00415                 adjacency_timed_reset(ccnd, face->faceid);
00416             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00417     }
00418 }
00419 
00420 /**
00421  * Send an adjacency solitiation interest, to elicit an offer from the
00422  * other side.
00423  */
00424 static int
00425 send_adjacency_solicit(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, struct face *face)
00426 {
00427     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
00428     struct ccn_charbuf *c;
00429     struct ccn_charbuf *g;
00430     struct ccn_charbuf *templ;
00431     struct ccn_closure *action = NULL;
00432     int i;
00433     int ans = -1;
00434 
00435     if (face == NULL || face->guid != NULL || face->adjstate != 0)
00436         return(-1);
00437     /* Need to poke the client library here so that it gets the curren time */
00438     ccn_process_scheduled_operations(ccnd->internal_client);
00439     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00440     c = ccn_charbuf_create();
00441     g = ccn_charbuf_create();
00442     templ = ccn_charbuf_create();
00443     /* Construct a proposed partial guid, without marker bytes */
00444     ccn_charbuf_reset(g);
00445     ccn_charbuf_append_value(g, 0, 1); /* 1 reserved byte of zero */
00446     /* The first half is chosen by our side */
00447     for (i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00448         ccn_charbuf_append_value(g, nrand48(ccnd->seed) & 0xff, 1);
00449     /* The second half will be chosen by the other side */
00450     for (i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00451         ccn_charbuf_append_value(g, 0, 1);
00452     /* Construct the interest */
00453     ccn_charbuf_reset(templ);
00454     ccnb_element_begin(templ, CCN_DTAG_Interest);
00455     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/%C1.M.FACE");
00456     ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(templ, name);
00457     /* This interest excludes all but a range of possible guid components */
00458     ccnb_element_begin(templ, CCN_DTAG_Exclude);
00459     ccnb_tagged_putf(templ, CCN_DTAG_Any, "");
00460     ccn_charbuf_reset(c);
00461     ccn_charbuf_append_string(c, "\xC1.M.G");
00462     ccn_charbuf_append_value(c, 0, 1);
00463     ccn_charbuf_append(c, g->buf, g->length);
00464     ccnb_append_tagged_blob(templ, CCN_DTAG_Component, c->buf, c->length);
00465     ccn_charbuf_reset(c);
00466     ccn_charbuf_append_string(c, "\xC1.M.G");
00467     ccn_charbuf_append_value(c, 0, 1);
00468     ccn_charbuf_append(c, g->buf, g->length - 6);
00469     for (i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00470         ccn_charbuf_append_value(c, 0xff, 1);
00471     ccnb_append_tagged_blob(templ, CCN_DTAG_Component, c->buf, c->length);
00472     ccnb_tagged_putf(templ, CCN_DTAG_Any, "");
00473     ccnb_element_end(templ); /* Exclude */
00474     /* We don't want to get confused by cached content */
00475     ccnb_tagged_putf(templ, CCN_DTAG_AnswerOriginKind, "%d", 0);
00476     /* Only talk to direct peers */
00477     ccnb_tagged_putf(templ, CCN_DTAG_Scope, "2");
00478     /* Bypass the FIB - send to just the face we want */
00479     ccnb_tagged_putf(templ, CCN_DTAG_FaceID, "%u", face->faceid);
00480     ccnb_element_end(templ); /* Interest */
00481     action = calloc(1, sizeof(*action));
00482     if (action != NULL) {
00483         action->p = &solicit_response;
00484         action->intdata = face->faceid;
00485         action->data = ccnd;
00486         ans = ccn_express_interest(ccnd->internal_client, name, action, templ);
00487         /* Use the guid slot to hold our proposal */
00488         if (ans >= 0)
00489             ans = ccnd_set_face_guid(ccnd, face, g->buf, g->length);
00490         if (ans >= 0) {
00491             adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_SOL_SENT, 0);
00492             ccnd_internal_client_has_somthing_to_say(ccnd);
00493         }
00494         ans = (ans < 0) ? -1 : 0;
00495     }
00496     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00497     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&c);
00498     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&g);
00499     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&templ);
00500     return(ans);
00501 }
00502 
00503 /**
00504  * Scheduled event to call send_adjacency_solicit.
00505  */
00506 static int
00507 ccnd_do_solicit(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00508                 void *clienth,
00509                 struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
00510                 int flags)
00511 {
00512     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = clienth;
00513     struct face *face = NULL;
00514     unsigned faceid;
00515     unsigned check, want;
00516     
00517     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) != 0)
00518         return(0);
00519     
00520     faceid = ev->evint;
00521     face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, faceid);
00522     if (face == NULL)
00523         return(0);
00524     check = CCN_FACE_CONNECTING | CCN_FACE_UNDECIDED | CCN_FACE_NOSEND |
00525             CCN_FACE_GG | CCN_FACE_MCAST | CCN_FACE_PASSIVE | CCN_FACE_NORECV |
00526             CCN_FACE_BC | CCN_FACE_ADJ;
00527     want = 0;
00528     if (face->adjstate == 0 && (face->flags & check) == want)
00529         send_adjacency_solicit(ccnd, face);
00530     return(0);
00531 }
00532 
00533 /**
00534  * Answer an adjacency guid request from any face, based on the guid
00535  * in the name.
00536  *
00537  * @returns CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED if an answer was sent,
00538  *  otherwise -1.
00539  */
00540 static int
00541 ccnd_answer_by_guid(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00542 {
00543     struct face *face = NULL;
00544     unsigned char mb[6] = "\xC1.M.G\x00";
00545     const unsigned char *p = NULL;
00546     size_t size = 0;
00547     unsigned faceid;
00548     int res;
00549     
00550     res = ccn_name_comp_get(info->interest_ccnb, info->interest_comps, 1,
00551                             &p, &size);
00552     if (res < 0)
00553         return(-1);
00554     if (size < sizeof(mb))
00555         return(-1);
00556     if (memcmp(p, mb, sizeof(mb)) != 0)
00557         return(-1);
00558     faceid = ccnd_faceid_from_guid(ccnd, p + sizeof(mb), size - sizeof(mb));
00559     if (faceid == CCN_NOFACEID)
00560         return(-1);
00561     face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, faceid);
00562     if (face == NULL)
00563         return(-1);
00564     if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_ADJ) == 0)
00565         return(-1);
00566     if (face->guid_cob == NULL)
00567         ccnd_init_face_guid_cob(ccnd, face);
00568     if (face->guid_cob == NULL)
00569         return(-1);
00570     res = -1;
00571     if (ccn_content_matches_interest(face->guid_cob->buf,
00572                                      face->guid_cob->length,
00573                                      1,
00574                                      NULL,
00575                                      info->interest_ccnb,
00576                                      info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
00577                                      info->pi
00578                                      )) {
00579         ccn_put(info->h, face->guid_cob->buf, face->guid_cob->length);
00580         res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
00581     }
00582     return(res);
00583 }
00584 
00585 /**
00586  * Handle the data comming back from an adjacency offer or commit request.
00587  */
00588 static enum ccn_upcall_res
00589 incoming_adjacency(struct ccn_closure *selfp,
00590                    enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
00591                    struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00592 {
00593     struct face *face = NULL;
00594     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = selfp->data;
00595     switch (kind) {
00596         case CCN_UPCALL_FINAL:
00597             free(selfp);
00598             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00599         case CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT:
00600             face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, selfp->intdata);
00601             if (face == NULL)
00602                 return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00603             if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_TIMEDWAIT)) != 0)
00604                 return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00605             /* XXX - this should scrutinize the data to make sure it is OK */
00606             if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_OFR_SENT | ADJ_CRQ_SENT)) != 0)
00607                 adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_DAT_RECV, 0);
00608             adjstate_change(ccnd, face, 0, ADJ_PINGING | ADJ_RETRYING);
00609             if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_CRQ_RECV)) != 0 &&
00610                 (face->adjstate & (ADJ_DAT_SENT)) == 0 &&
00611                 face->guid_cob != 0) {
00612                 ccn_put(info->h, face->guid_cob->buf,
00613                                  face->guid_cob->length);
00614                 adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_DAT_SENT, 0);
00615                 if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_DAT_RECV)) == 0)
00616                     ccnd_adjacency_offer_or_commit_req(ccnd, face);
00617             }
00618             ccnd_register_adjacency(ccnd, face,
00619                                     CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | CCN_FORW_ACTIVE);
00620             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00621         case CCN_UPCALL_INTEREST_TIMED_OUT:
00622             face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, selfp->intdata);
00623             if (face == NULL)
00624                 return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00625             if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_RETRYING | ADJ_TIMEDWAIT)) == 0) {
00626                 /* Retry one time */
00627                 adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_RETRYING, 0);
00628                 return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_REEXPRESS);
00629             }
00630             adjacency_timed_reset(ccnd, face->faceid);
00631             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00632         default:
00633             face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, selfp->intdata);
00634             if (face != NULL)
00635                 adjacency_timed_reset(ccnd, face->faceid);
00636             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00637     }
00638 }
00639 
00640 /**
00641  * Express an interest to pull adjacency information from the other side
00642  */
00643 void
00644 ccnd_adjacency_offer_or_commit_req(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, struct face *face)
00645 {
00646     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
00647     struct ccn_charbuf *c;
00648     struct ccn_charbuf *templ;
00649     struct ccn_closure *action = NULL;
00650     
00651     if (face == NULL || face->guid == NULL)
00652         return;
00653     if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_SOL_SENT | ADJ_TIMEDWAIT)) != 0)
00654         return;
00655     if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_PINGING)) != 0)
00656         return;
00657     /* Need to poke the client library here so that it gets the current time */
00658     ccn_process_scheduled_operations(ccnd->internal_client);
00659     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00660     c = ccn_charbuf_create();
00661     templ = ccn_charbuf_create();
00662     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/%C1.M.FACE");
00663     ccn_charbuf_reset(c);
00664     ccn_charbuf_append_string(c, "\xC1.M.G");
00665     ccn_charbuf_append_value(c, 0, 1);
00666     ccnd_append_face_guid(ccnd, c, face);
00667     ccn_name_append(name, c->buf, c->length);
00668     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "%C1.M.NODE");
00669     ccn_charbuf_reset(templ);
00670     ccnb_element_begin(templ, CCN_DTAG_Interest);
00671     ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(templ, name);
00672     ccnb_element_begin(templ, CCN_DTAG_Exclude);
00673     ccn_charbuf_reset(c);
00674     ccn_charbuf_append_string(c, "\xC1.M.K");
00675     ccn_charbuf_append_value(c, 0, 1);
00676     ccn_charbuf_append(c, ccnd->ccnd_id, sizeof(ccnd->ccnd_id));
00677     ccnb_append_tagged_blob(templ, CCN_DTAG_Component, c->buf, c->length);
00678     ccnb_element_end(templ); /* Exclude */
00679     ccnb_tagged_putf(templ, CCN_DTAG_AnswerOriginKind, "%d", 0);
00680     ccnb_tagged_putf(templ, CCN_DTAG_Scope, "2");
00681     ccnb_tagged_putf(templ, CCN_DTAG_FaceID, "%u", face->faceid);
00682     ccnb_element_end(templ); /* Interest */
00683     action = calloc(1, sizeof(*action));
00684     if (action != NULL) {
00685         action->p = &incoming_adjacency;
00686         action->intdata = face->faceid;
00687         action->data = ccnd;
00688         adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_PINGING, ADJ_RETRYING);
00689         ccn_express_interest(ccnd->internal_client, name, action, templ);
00690         if ((face->adjstate & ADJ_OFR_RECV) != 0)
00691             adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_CRQ_SENT, 0);
00692         else
00693             adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_OFR_SENT, 0);
00694     }
00695     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00696     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&c);
00697     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&templ);
00698 }
00699 
00700 /**
00701  * Determine whether an offer matches up with our solicitation.
00702  */
00703 static void
00704 check_offer_matches_my_solicit(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, struct face *face,
00705                                struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00706 {
00707     const unsigned char *p = NULL;
00708     size_t size = 0;
00709     int res;
00710     const char *mg = "\xC1.M.G";
00711     const char *mn = "\xC1.M.NODE";
00712     
00713     if (info->pi->prefix_comps != 3)
00714         return;
00715     if ((face->adjstate & ADJ_SOL_SENT) == 0)
00716         return;
00717     if (face->guid == NULL)
00718         return;
00719     res = ccn_name_comp_get(info->interest_ccnb, info->interest_comps, 2,
00720                             &p, &size);
00721     if (res < 0)
00722         return;
00723     if (size != strlen(mn) || 0 != memcmp(p, mn, size))
00724         return;
00725     res = ccn_name_comp_get(info->interest_ccnb, info->interest_comps, 1,
00726                             &p, &size);
00727     if (res < 0)
00728         return;
00729     res = strlen(mg) + 1;
00730     if (size != res + face->guid[0] || face->guid[0] <= 6)
00731         return;
00732     if (0 != memcmp(p, mg, res))
00733         return;
00734     if (0 != memcmp(p + res, face->guid + 1, face->guid[0] - 6))
00735         return;
00736     ccnd_forget_face_guid(ccnd, face);
00737     ccnd_set_face_guid(ccnd, face, p + res, size - res);
00738     adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_OFR_RECV, ADJ_SOL_SENT);
00739 }
00740 
00741 /**
00742  * Schedule negotiation of a link guid if appropriate
00743  */
00744 static void
00745 schedule_adjacency_negotiation(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, unsigned faceid)
00746 {
00747     struct face *face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, faceid);
00748     unsigned check, want;
00749     int delay;
00750     
00751     if (face == NULL)
00752         return;
00753     check = CCN_FACE_CONNECTING | CCN_FACE_UNDECIDED | CCN_FACE_NOSEND |
00754             CCN_FACE_GG | CCN_FACE_MCAST | CCN_FACE_PASSIVE | CCN_FACE_NORECV |
00755             CCN_FACE_BC | CCN_FACE_ADJ;
00756     want = 0;
00757     if (ccnd->sched != NULL && (face->flags & check) == want) {
00758         /* If face creation was initiated remotely, dally a bit longer. */
00759         delay = 2000 + nrand48(ccnd->seed) % 131072U;
00760         if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_PERMANENT) == 0)
00761             delay += 200000;
00762         ccn_schedule_event(ccnd->sched, delay, ccnd_do_solicit, NULL, faceid);
00763     }
00764 }
00765 
00766 /**
00767  * Scheduled event for recovering from a broken adjacency negotiation
00768  */
00769 static int
00770 adjacency_do_reset(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00771                    void *clienth,
00772                    struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
00773                    int flags)
00774 {
00775     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = clienth;
00776     struct face *face = NULL;
00777     
00778     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) != 0)
00779         return(0);
00780     face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, ev->evint);
00781     if (face == NULL)
00782         return(0);
00783     if ((face->adjstate & ADJ_TIMEDWAIT) == 0)
00784         return(0);
00785     if (face->adjstate != ADJ_TIMEDWAIT) {
00786         adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_TIMEDWAIT, ~ADJ_ACTIVE);
00787         ccnd_forget_face_guid(ccnd, face);
00788         return(666666);
00789     }
00790     adjstate_change(ccnd, face, 0, ~0);
00791     schedule_adjacency_negotiation(ccnd, face->faceid);
00792     return(0);
00793 }
00794 
00795 /**
00796  * Schedule recovery from a broken adjacency negotiation
00797  */
00798 static void
00799 adjacency_timed_reset(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, unsigned faceid)
00800 {
00801     struct face *face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, faceid);
00802     
00803     if (face == NULL || ccnd->sched == NULL)
00804         return;
00805     if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_ADJ) != 0) {
00806         ccnd_face_status_change(ccnd, faceid);
00807         face->flags &= ~CCN_FACE_ADJ;
00808     }
00809     adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_TIMEDWAIT, ~ADJ_ACTIVE);
00810     ccnd_forget_face_guid(ccnd, face);
00811     ccn_schedule_event(ccnd->sched, 9000000 + nrand48(ccnd->seed) % 8000000U,
00812                        adjacency_do_reset, NULL, faceid);
00813 }
00814 
00815 static int
00816 clean_guest(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00817             void *clienth,
00818             struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
00819             int flags)
00820 {
00821     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = clienth;
00822     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
00823     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
00824     unsigned faceid;
00825     int res;
00826     
00827     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) != 0)
00828         return(0);
00829     faceid = ev->evint;
00830     hashtb_start(ccnd->guest_tab, e);
00831     res = hashtb_seek(e, &faceid, sizeof(unsigned), 0);
00832     if (res < 0)
00833         return(-1);
00834     hashtb_delete(e);
00835     hashtb_end(e);
00836     return(0);
00837 }
00838 
00839 static enum ccn_upcall_res
00840 ccnd_req_guest(struct ccn_closure *selfp,
00841                enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
00842                struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00843 {
00844     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = selfp->data;
00845     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
00846     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
00847     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
00848     const char *guest_uri = NULL;
00849     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00850     struct ccn_charbuf *uri = NULL;
00851     struct face *reqface = NULL;
00852     struct guest_entry *g = NULL;
00853     const unsigned char *p = NULL;
00854     size_t size = 0;
00855     size_t start = 0;
00856     size_t end = 0;
00857     int res;
00858     
00859     guest_uri = getenv("CCND_PREFIX");
00860     if (guest_uri == NULL || guest_uri[0] == 0)
00861         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00862     reqface = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, ccnd->interest_faceid);
00863     if (reqface == NULL)
00864         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00865     if ((reqface->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) != 0)
00866         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00867     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00868     if (name == NULL)
00869         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00870     res = ccn_name_from_uri(name, guest_uri);
00871     if (res < 0) {
00872         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00873         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00874     }
00875     hashtb_start(ccnd->guest_tab, e);
00876     res = hashtb_seek(e, &reqface->faceid, sizeof(unsigned), 0);
00877     if (res < 0) {
00878         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00879         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00880     }
00881     g = e->data;
00882     hashtb_end(e);
00883     if (g->cob != NULL) {
00884         if (ccn_content_matches_interest(g->cob->buf,
00885                                          g->cob->length,
00886                                          1,
00887                                          NULL,
00888                                          info->interest_ccnb,
00889                                          info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
00890                                          info->pi)) {
00891             ccn_put(info->h, g->cob->buf, g->cob->length);
00892             ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00893             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED);
00894         }
00895         /* We have a cob cached; no new one until the old one expires */
00896         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00897         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00898     }
00899     if (info->interest_comps->n != 4) {
00900         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00901         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00902     }
00903     res = ccn_name_comp_get(info->interest_ccnb, info->interest_comps, 2,
00904                             &p, &size);
00905     if (res < 0) {
00906         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00907         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00908     }
00909     ccn_name_append(name, p, size);
00910     uri = ccn_charbuf_create();
00911     ccn_uri_append(uri, name->buf, name->length, 1);
00912     ccnd_reg_uri(ccnd, ccn_charbuf_as_string(uri), reqface->faceid,
00913                  CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | CCN_FORW_ACTIVE,
00914                  0x7FFFFFFF);
00915     g->cob = ccn_charbuf_create();
00916     ccn_charbuf_reset(name);
00917     start = info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Name];
00918     end = info->interest_comps->buf[info->pi->prefix_comps];
00919     ccn_charbuf_append(name, info->interest_ccnb + start, end - start);
00920     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(name);
00921     ccn_create_version(info->h, name, CCN_V_NOW, 0, 0);
00922     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "%00");
00923     sp.sp_flags = CCN_SP_FINAL_BLOCK;
00924     sp.freshness = 5;
00925     res = ccn_sign_content(info->h, g->cob, name, &sp, uri->buf, uri->length);
00926     if (res < 0) {
00927         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00928         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&g->cob);
00929         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri);
00930         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00931     }
00932     ccn_schedule_event(ccnd->sched, sp.freshness * 1000000,
00933                        clean_guest, NULL, reqface->faceid);
00934     if (g->cob != NULL &&
00935         ccn_content_matches_interest(g->cob->buf,
00936                                      g->cob->length,
00937                                      1,
00938                                      NULL,
00939                                      info->interest_ccnb,
00940                                      info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
00941                                      info->pi)) {
00942         ccn_put(info->h, g->cob->buf, g->cob->length);
00943         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00944         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri);
00945         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED);
00946     }
00947     return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00948 }
00949 
00950 /**
00951  * Local interpretation of selfp->intdata
00952  */
00953 #define MORECOMPS_MASK 0x007F
00954 #define MUST_VERIFY    0x0080
00955 #define MUST_VERIFY1   (MUST_VERIFY + 1)
00956 #define OPER_MASK      0xFF00
00957 #define OP_PING        0x0000
00958 #define OP_NEWFACE     0x0200
00959 #define OP_DESTROYFACE 0x0300
00960 #define OP_PREFIXREG   0x0400
00961 #define OP_SELFREG     0x0500
00962 #define OP_UNREG       0x0600
00963 #define OP_NOTICE      0x0700
00964 #define OP_SERVICE     0x0800
00965 #define OP_ADJACENCY   0x0900
00966 #define OP_GUEST       0x0A00
00967 
00968 /**
00969  * Common interest handler for ccnd_internal_client
00970  */
00971 static enum ccn_upcall_res
00972 ccnd_answer_req(struct ccn_closure *selfp,
00973                  enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
00974                  struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00975 {
00976     struct ccn_charbuf *msg = NULL;
00977     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00978     struct ccn_charbuf *keylocator = NULL;
00979     struct ccn_charbuf *signed_info = NULL;
00980     struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body = NULL;
00981     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = NULL;
00982     int res = 0;
00983     int start = 0;
00984     int end = 0;
00985     int morecomps = 0;
00986     const unsigned char *final_comp = NULL;
00987     size_t final_size = 0;
00988     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
00989     struct face *face = NULL;
00990     
00991     switch (kind) {
00992         case CCN_UPCALL_FINAL:
00993             free(selfp);
00994             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00995         case CCN_UPCALL_INTEREST:
00996             break;
00997         case CCN_UPCALL_CONSUMED_INTEREST:
00998             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00999         default:
01000             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
01001     }
01002     ccnd = (struct ccnd_handle *)selfp->data;
01003     if ((ccnd->debug & 128) != 0)
01004         ccnd_debug_ccnb(ccnd, __LINE__, "ccnd_answer_req", NULL,
01005                         info->interest_ccnb, info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E]);
01006     morecomps = selfp->intdata & MORECOMPS_MASK;
01007     if ((info->pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_NEW) == 0 &&
01008         selfp->intdata != OP_SERVICE &&
01009         selfp->intdata != OP_NOTICE &&
01010         selfp->intdata != OP_ADJACENCY &&
01011         selfp->intdata != OP_GUEST)
01012         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
01013     if (info->matched_comps >= info->interest_comps->n)
01014         goto Bail;
01015     if (selfp->intdata != OP_PING &&
01016         selfp->intdata != OP_NOTICE &&
01017         selfp->intdata != OP_SERVICE &&
01018         selfp->intdata != OP_ADJACENCY &&
01019         selfp->intdata != OP_GUEST &&
01020         info->pi->prefix_comps != info->matched_comps + morecomps)
01021         goto Bail;
01022     if (morecomps == 1) {
01023         res = ccn_name_comp_get(info->interest_ccnb, info->interest_comps,
01024                                 info->matched_comps,
01025                                 &final_comp, &final_size);
01026         if (res < 0)
01027             goto Bail;
01028     }
01029     if ((selfp->intdata & MUST_VERIFY) != 0) {
01030         struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
01031         // XXX - probably should check for message origin BEFORE verify
01032         res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(final_comp, final_size, &pco, NULL);
01033         if (res < 0) {
01034             ccnd_debug_ccnb(ccnd, __LINE__, "co_parse_failed", NULL,
01035                             info->interest_ccnb, info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E]);
01036             goto Bail;
01037         }
01038         res = ccn_verify_content(info->h, final_comp, &pco);
01039         if (res != 0) {
01040             ccnd_debug_ccnb(ccnd, __LINE__, "co_verify_failed", NULL,
01041                             info->interest_ccnb, info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E]);
01042             goto Bail;
01043         }
01044     }
01045     sp.freshness = 10;
01046     switch (selfp->intdata & OPER_MASK) {
01047         case OP_PING:
01048             reply_body = ccn_charbuf_create();
01049             sp.freshness = (info->pi->prefix_comps == info->matched_comps) ? 60 : 5;
01050             res = 0;
01051             break;
01052         case OP_NEWFACE:
01053             reply_body = ccn_charbuf_create();
01054             res = ccnd_req_newface(ccnd, final_comp, final_size, reply_body);
01055             break;
01056         case OP_DESTROYFACE:
01057             reply_body = ccn_charbuf_create();
01058             res = ccnd_req_destroyface(ccnd, final_comp, final_size, reply_body);
01059             break;
01060         case OP_PREFIXREG:
01061             reply_body = ccn_charbuf_create();
01062             res = ccnd_req_prefixreg(ccnd, final_comp, final_size, reply_body);
01063             break;
01064         case OP_SELFREG:
01065             reply_body = ccn_charbuf_create();
01066             res = ccnd_req_selfreg(ccnd, final_comp, final_size, reply_body);
01067             break;
01068         case OP_UNREG:
01069             reply_body = ccn_charbuf_create();
01070             res = ccnd_req_unreg(ccnd, final_comp, final_size, reply_body);
01071             break;
01072         case OP_NOTICE:
01073             ccnd_start_notice(ccnd);
01074             goto Bail;
01075             break;
01076         case OP_SERVICE:
01077             if (ccnd->service_ccnb == NULL)
01078                 ccnd->service_ccnb = ccnd_init_service_ccnb(ccnd, CCNDID_LOCAL_URI, 600);
01079             if (ccn_content_matches_interest(
01080                     ccnd->service_ccnb->buf,
01081                     ccnd->service_ccnb->length,
01082                     1,
01083                     NULL,
01084                     info->interest_ccnb,
01085                     info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
01086                     info->pi
01087                 )) {
01088                 ccn_put(info->h, ccnd->service_ccnb->buf,
01089                                  ccnd->service_ccnb->length);
01090                 res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
01091                 goto Finish;
01092             }
01093             // XXX this needs refactoring.
01094             if (ccnd->neighbor_ccnb == NULL)
01095                 ccnd->neighbor_ccnb = ccnd_init_service_ccnb(ccnd, CCNDID_NEIGHBOR_URI, 5);
01096             if (ccn_content_matches_interest(
01097                     ccnd->neighbor_ccnb->buf,
01098                     ccnd->neighbor_ccnb->length,
01099                     1,
01100                     NULL,
01101                     info->interest_ccnb,
01102                     info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
01103                     info->pi
01104                 )) {
01105                 ccn_put(info->h, ccnd->neighbor_ccnb->buf,
01106                                  ccnd->neighbor_ccnb->length);
01107                 res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
01108                 goto Finish;
01109             }
01110             goto Bail;
01111             break;
01112         case OP_ADJACENCY:
01113             if (info->pi->prefix_comps >= 2 && (info->pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_CS) != 0) {
01114                 res = ccnd_answer_by_guid(ccnd, info);
01115                 if (res == CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED)
01116                     goto Finish;
01117             }
01118             face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, ccnd->interest_faceid);
01119             if (face == NULL)
01120                 goto Bail;
01121             if (info->pi->prefix_comps == 1 && face->guid == NULL) {
01122                 const unsigned char *lo = NULL;
01123                 const unsigned char *hi = NULL;
01124                 int size = 0;
01125                 unsigned char mb[6] = "\xC1.M.G\x00";
01126                 
01127                 size = extract_bounds(info->interest_ccnb, info->pi, &lo, &hi);
01128                 if (size > (int)sizeof(mb) &&
01129                     0 == memcmp(mb, lo, sizeof(mb)) &&
01130                     0 == memcmp(mb, hi, sizeof(mb))) {
01131                     size -= sizeof(mb);
01132                     lo += sizeof(mb);
01133                     hi += sizeof(mb);
01134                     // XXX - we may want to be selective about proceeding
01135                     if ((face->adjstate & ADJ_SOL_SENT) != 0) {
01136                         /* The solicitations crossed in the mail. Arbitrate. */
01137                         if (face->guid != NULL && size >= face->guid[0] &&
01138                             memcmp(lo, face->guid + 1, face->guid[0]) > 0) {
01139                             ccnd_forget_face_guid(ccnd, face);
01140                             adjstate_change(ccnd, face, 0, ADJ_SOL_SENT);
01141                         }
01142                     }
01143                     adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_SOL_RECV, ADJ_TIMEDWAIT);
01144                     ccnd_generate_face_guid(ccnd, face, size, lo, hi);
01145                     if (face->guid != NULL) {
01146                         ccnd_adjacency_offer_or_commit_req(ccnd, face);
01147                         res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
01148                         goto Finish;
01149                     }
01150                 }
01151             }
01152             check_offer_matches_my_solicit(ccnd, face, info);
01153             if (face->guid_cob == NULL)
01154                 ccnd_init_face_guid_cob(ccnd, face);
01155             if (face->guid_cob != NULL &&
01156                 ccn_content_matches_interest(face->guid_cob->buf,
01157                                              face->guid_cob->length,
01158                                              1,
01159                                              NULL,
01160                                              info->interest_ccnb,
01161                                              info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
01162                                              info->pi
01163                                              )) {
01164                 if (info->pi->prefix_comps == 3)
01165                     adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_CRQ_RECV, 0);
01166                 if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_DAT_RECV | ADJ_OFR_RECV)) != 0) {
01167                     ccn_put(info->h, face->guid_cob->buf,
01168                             face->guid_cob->length);                    
01169                     adjstate_change(ccnd, face, ADJ_DAT_SENT, 0);
01170                     if ((face->adjstate & (ADJ_DAT_RECV)) == 0)
01171                         ccnd_adjacency_offer_or_commit_req(ccnd, face);
01172                 }
01173                 ccnd_register_adjacency(ccnd, face,
01174                       CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | CCN_FORW_ACTIVE);
01175                 res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
01176                 goto Finish;
01177             }
01178             goto Bail;
01179         case OP_GUEST:
01180             res = ccnd_req_guest(selfp, kind, info);
01181             goto Finish;
01182         default:
01183             goto Bail;
01184     }
01185     if (res < 0)
01186         goto Bail;
01187     if (res == CCN_CONTENT_NACK)
01188         sp.type = res;
01189     msg = ccn_charbuf_create();
01190     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
01191     start = info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Name];
01192     end = info->interest_comps->buf[info->pi->prefix_comps];
01193     ccn_charbuf_append(name, info->interest_ccnb + start, end - start);
01194     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(name);
01195     res = ccn_sign_content(info->h, msg, name, &sp,
01196                            reply_body->buf, reply_body->length);
01197     if (res < 0)
01198         goto Bail;
01199     if ((ccnd->debug & 128) != 0)
01200         ccnd_debug_ccnb(ccnd, __LINE__, "ccnd_answer_req_response", NULL,
01201                         msg->buf, msg->length);
01202     res = ccn_put(info->h, msg->buf, msg->length);
01203     if (res < 0)
01204         goto Bail;
01205     if (CCND_TEST_100137)
01206         ccn_put(info->h, msg->buf, msg->length);
01207     res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
01208     goto Finish;
01209 Bail:
01210     res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR;
01211 Finish:
01212     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&msg);
01213     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
01214     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&keylocator);
01215     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&reply_body);
01216     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&signed_info);
01217     return(res);
01218 }
01219 
01220 static int
01221 ccnd_internal_client_refresh(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
01222                void *clienth,
01223                struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
01224                int flags)
01225 {
01226     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = clienth;
01227     int microsec = 0;
01228     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) == 0 &&
01229           ccnd->internal_client != NULL &&
01230           ccnd->internal_client_refresh == ev) {
01231         microsec = ccn_process_scheduled_operations(ccnd->internal_client);
01232         if (microsec > ev->evint)
01233             microsec = ev->evint;
01234     }
01235     if (microsec <= 0 && ccnd->internal_client_refresh == ev)
01236         ccnd->internal_client_refresh = NULL;
01237     return(microsec);
01238 }
01239 
01240 #define CCND_ID_TEMPL "XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX"
01241 
01242 static void
01243 ccnd_uri_listen(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, const char *uri,
01244                 ccn_handler p, intptr_t intdata)
01245 {
01246     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
01247     struct ccn_charbuf *uri_modified = NULL;
01248     struct ccn_closure *closure;
01249     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps;
01250     const unsigned char *comp;
01251     size_t comp_size;
01252     size_t offset;
01253     int reg_wanted = 1;
01254     
01255     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
01256     ccn_name_from_uri(name, uri);
01257     comps = ccn_indexbuf_create();
01258     if (ccn_name_split(name, comps) < 0)
01259         abort();
01260     if (ccn_name_comp_get(name->buf, comps, 1, &comp, &comp_size) >= 0) {
01261         if (comp_size == 32 && 0 == memcmp(comp, CCND_ID_TEMPL, 32)) {
01262             /* Replace placeholder with our ccnd_id */
01263             offset = comp - name->buf;
01264             memcpy(name->buf + offset, ccnd->ccnd_id, 32);
01265             uri_modified = ccn_charbuf_create();
01266             ccn_uri_append(uri_modified, name->buf, name->length, 1);
01267             uri = (char *)uri_modified->buf;
01268             reg_wanted = 0;
01269         }
01270     }
01271     closure = calloc(1, sizeof(*closure));
01272     closure->p = p;
01273     closure->data = ccnd;
01274     closure->intdata = intdata;
01275     /* Register explicitly if needed or requested */
01276     if (reg_wanted)
01277         ccnd_reg_uri(ccnd, uri,
01278                      0, /* special faceid for internal client */
01279                      CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | CCN_FORW_ACTIVE,
01280                      0x7FFFFFFF);
01281     ccn_set_interest_filter(ccnd->internal_client, name, closure);
01282     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
01283     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri_modified);
01284     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&comps);
01285 }
01286 
01287 /**
01288  * Make a forwarding table entry for ccnx:/ccnx/CCNDID
01289  *
01290  * This one entry handles most of the namespace served by the
01291  * ccnd internal client.
01292  */
01293 static void
01294 ccnd_reg_ccnx_ccndid(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
01295 {
01296     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
01297     struct ccn_charbuf *uri;
01298     
01299     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
01300     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/ccnx");
01301     ccn_name_append(name, ccnd->ccnd_id, 32);
01302     uri = ccn_charbuf_create();
01303     ccn_uri_append(uri, name->buf, name->length, 1);
01304     ccnd_reg_uri(ccnd, ccn_charbuf_as_string(uri),
01305                  0, /* special faceid for internal client */
01306                  (CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT |
01307                   CCN_FORW_ACTIVE        |
01308                   CCN_FORW_CAPTURE       |
01309                   CCN_FORW_ADVERTISE     ),
01310                  0x7FFFFFFF);
01311     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
01312     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri);
01313 }
01314 
01315 #ifndef CCN_PATH_VAR_TMP
01316 #define CCN_PATH_VAR_TMP "/var/tmp"
01317 #endif
01318 
01319 /*
01320  * This is used to shroud the contents of the keystore, which mainly serves
01321  * to add integrity checking and defense against accidental misuse.
01322  * The file permissions serve for restricting access to the private keys.
01323  */
01324 #ifndef CCND_KEYSTORE_PASS
01325 #define CCND_KEYSTORE_PASS "\010\043\103\375\327\237\152\351\155"
01326 #endif
01327 
01328 int
01329 ccnd_init_internal_keystore(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
01330 {
01331     struct ccn_charbuf *temp = NULL;
01332     struct ccn_charbuf *cmd = NULL;
01333     struct ccn_charbuf *culprit = NULL;
01334     struct stat statbuf;
01335     const char *dir = NULL;
01336     int res = -1;
01337     char *keystore_path = NULL;
01338     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
01339     
01340     if (ccnd->internal_client == NULL)
01341         return(-1);
01342     temp = ccn_charbuf_create();
01343     cmd = ccn_charbuf_create();
01344     dir = getenv("CCND_KEYSTORE_DIRECTORY");
01345     if (dir != NULL && dir[0] == '/')
01346         ccn_charbuf_putf(temp, "%s/", dir);
01347     else
01348         ccn_charbuf_putf(temp, CCN_PATH_VAR_TMP "/.ccnx-user%d/", (int)geteuid());
01349     res = stat(ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp), &statbuf);
01350     if (res == -1) {
01351         if (errno == ENOENT)
01352             res = mkdir(ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp), 0700);
01353         if (res != 0) {
01354             culprit = temp;
01355             goto Finish;
01356         }
01357     }
01358     ccn_charbuf_putf(temp, ".ccnd_keystore_%s", ccnd->portstr);
01359     keystore_path = strdup(ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp));
01360     res = stat(keystore_path, &statbuf);
01361     if (res == 0)
01362         res = ccn_load_default_key(ccnd->internal_client, keystore_path, CCND_KEYSTORE_PASS);
01363     if (res >= 0)
01364         goto Finish;
01365     /* No stored keystore that we can access; create one. */
01366     res = ccn_keystore_file_init(keystore_path, CCND_KEYSTORE_PASS, "CCND-internal", 0, 0);
01367     if (res != 0) {
01368         culprit = temp;
01369         goto Finish;
01370     }
01371     res = ccn_load_default_key(ccnd->internal_client, keystore_path, CCND_KEYSTORE_PASS);
01372     if (res != 0)
01373         culprit = temp;
01374 Finish:
01375     if (culprit != NULL) {
01376         ccnd_msg(ccnd, "%s: %s:\n", ccn_charbuf_as_string(culprit), strerror(errno));
01377         culprit = NULL;
01378     }
01379     res = ccn_chk_signing_params(ccnd->internal_client, NULL, &sp, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
01380     if (res != 0)
01381         abort();
01382     memcpy(ccnd->ccnd_id, sp.pubid, sizeof(ccnd->ccnd_id));
01383     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&temp);
01384     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&cmd);
01385     if (keystore_path != NULL)
01386         free(keystore_path);
01387     return(res);
01388 }
01389 
01390 static int
01391 post_face_notice(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, unsigned faceid)
01392 {
01393     struct face *face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, faceid);
01394     struct ccn_charbuf *msg = ccn_charbuf_create();
01395     int res = -1;
01396     int port;
01397     int n;
01398     
01399     // XXX - text version for trying out stream stuff - replace with ccnb
01400     if (face == NULL)
01401         ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, "destroyface(%u);\n", faceid);
01402     else {
01403         ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, "newface(%u, 0x%x", faceid, face->flags);
01404         n = 2;
01405         if (face->addr != NULL &&
01406             (face->flags & (CCN_FACE_INET | CCN_FACE_INET6)) != 0) {
01407             ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, ", ");
01408             n++;
01409             port = ccn_charbuf_append_sockaddr(msg, face->addr);
01410             if (port < 0)
01411                 msg->length--;
01412             else if (port > 0)
01413                 ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, ":%d", port);
01414         }
01415         if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_ADJ) != 0) {
01416             for (; n < 4; n++)
01417                 ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, ", ");
01418             append_adjacency_uri(ccnd, msg, face);
01419         }
01420         ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, ");\n", faceid);
01421     }
01422     res = ccn_seqw_write(ccnd->notice, msg->buf, msg->length);
01423     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&msg);
01424     return(res);
01425 }
01426 
01427 static int
01428 ccnd_notice_push(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
01429                void *clienth,
01430                struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
01431                int flags)
01432 {
01433     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = clienth;
01434     struct ccn_indexbuf *chface = NULL;
01435     int i = 0;
01436     int j = 0;
01437     int microsec = 0;
01438     int res = 0;
01439     
01440     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) == 0 &&
01441             ccnd->notice != NULL &&
01442             ccnd->notice_push == ev &&
01443             ccnd->chface != NULL) {
01444         chface = ccnd->chface;
01445         ccn_seqw_batch_start(ccnd->notice);
01446         for (i = 0; i < chface->n && res != -1; i++)
01447             res = post_face_notice(ccnd, chface->buf[i]);
01448         ccn_seqw_batch_end(ccnd->notice);
01449         for (j = 0; i < chface->n; i++, j++)
01450             chface->buf[j] = chface->buf[i];
01451         chface->n = j;
01452         if (res == -1)
01453             microsec = 3000;
01454     }
01455     if (microsec <= 0)
01456         ccnd->notice_push = NULL;
01457     return(microsec);
01458 }
01459 
01460 /**
01461  * Called by ccnd when a face undergoes a substantive status change that
01462  * should be reported to interested parties.
01463  *
01464  * In the destroy case, this is called from the hash table finalizer,
01465  * so it shouldn't do much directly.  Inspecting the face is OK, though.
01466  */
01467 void
01468 ccnd_face_status_change(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, unsigned faceid)
01469 {
01470     struct ccn_indexbuf *chface = ccnd->chface;
01471     
01472     if (chface != NULL) {
01473         ccn_indexbuf_set_insert(chface, faceid);
01474         if (ccnd->notice_push == NULL)
01475             ccnd->notice_push = ccn_schedule_event(ccnd->sched, 2000,
01476                                                    ccnd_notice_push,
01477                                                    NULL, 0);
01478     }
01479     schedule_adjacency_negotiation(ccnd, faceid);
01480 }
01481 
01482 static void
01483 ccnd_start_notice(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
01484 {
01485     struct ccn *h = ccnd->internal_client;
01486     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
01487     struct face *face = NULL;
01488     int i;
01489     
01490     if (h == NULL)
01491         return;
01492     if (ccnd->notice != NULL)
01493         return;
01494     if (ccnd->chface != NULL) {
01495         /* Probably should not happen. */
01496         ccnd_msg(ccnd, "ccnd_internal_client.c:%d Huh?", __LINE__);
01497         ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&ccnd->chface);
01498     }
01499     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
01500     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/ccnx");
01501     ccn_name_append(name, ccnd->ccnd_id, 32);
01502     ccn_name_append_str(name, CCND_NOTICE_NAME);
01503     ccnd->notice = ccn_seqw_create(h, name);
01504     ccnd->chface = ccn_indexbuf_create();
01505     for (i = 0; i < ccnd->face_limit; i++) {
01506         face = ccnd->faces_by_faceid[i];
01507         if (face != NULL)
01508             ccn_indexbuf_set_insert(ccnd->chface, face->faceid);
01509     }
01510     if (ccnd->chface->n > 0)
01511         ccnd_face_status_change(ccnd, ccnd->chface->buf[0]);
01512     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
01513 }
01514 
01515 int
01516 ccnd_internal_client_start(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
01517 {
01518     struct ccn *h;
01519     if (ccnd->internal_client != NULL)
01520         return(-1);
01521     if (ccnd->face0 == NULL)
01522         abort();
01523     ccnd->internal_client = h = ccn_create();
01524     if (ccnd_init_internal_keystore(ccnd) < 0) {
01525         ccn_destroy(&ccnd->internal_client);
01526         return(-1);
01527     }
01528 #if (CCND_PING+0)
01529     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/ping",
01530                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_PING);
01531     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/ping",
01532                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_PING);
01533 #endif
01534     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/newface",
01535                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_NEWFACE + MUST_VERIFY1);
01536     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/destroyface",
01537                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_DESTROYFACE + MUST_VERIFY1);
01538     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/prefixreg",
01539                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_PREFIXREG + MUST_VERIFY1);
01540     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/selfreg",
01541                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_SELFREG + MUST_VERIFY1);
01542     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/unreg",
01543                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_UNREG + MUST_VERIFY1);
01544     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/" CCND_NOTICE_NAME,
01545                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_NOTICE);
01546     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.localhost/%C1.M.SRV/ccnd",
01547                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_SERVICE);
01548     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.neighborhood",
01549                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_SERVICE);
01550     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.neighborhood/guest",
01551                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_GUEST);
01552     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/%C1.M.FACE",
01553                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_ADJACENCY);
01554     ccnd_reg_ccnx_ccndid(ccnd);
01555     ccnd_reg_uri(ccnd, "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.localhost",
01556                  0, /* special faceid for internal client */
01557                  (CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT |
01558                   CCN_FORW_ACTIVE        |
01559                   CCN_FORW_LOCAL         ),
01560                  0x7FFFFFFF);
01561     ccnd->internal_client_refresh \
01562     = ccn_schedule_event(ccnd->sched, 50000,
01563                          ccnd_internal_client_refresh,
01564                          NULL, CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC);
01565     return(0);
01566 }
01567 
01568 void
01569 ccnd_internal_client_stop(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
01570 {
01571     ccnd->notice = NULL; /* ccn_destroy will free */
01572     if (ccnd->notice_push != NULL)
01573         ccn_schedule_cancel(ccnd->sched, ccnd->notice_push);
01574     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&ccnd->chface);
01575     ccn_destroy(&ccnd->internal_client);
01576     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&ccnd->service_ccnb);
01577     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&ccnd->neighbor_ccnb);
01578     if (ccnd->internal_client_refresh != NULL)
01579         ccn_schedule_cancel(ccnd->sched, ccnd->internal_client_refresh);
01580 }
